Calculate how many genotypes we can have:
400 plots
3 plots per genotype
3 checks with 10 plots each
5 stands per plot

```{r}
(400 - (3*10))/3
```

123 genotypes if replicated in 3 plots each.

Read in genotypes
```{r, echo=F}
library(tidyverse)
library(AlgDesign)
library(genetics)
library(reshape2)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(vcfR)
```
Read in CET genotypes vcf
```{r}
read.vcfR("~/Desktop/Research/Glaziovii_introgression/CET_Dec2021/AlphaAssign/GlazParentsGenotypes.vcf")
```
